description:
Description
Exam scores of 4,059 students from 65 schools in Inner London.
title: Exam scores from inner London

parameters.vr:
Student level Verbal Reasoning (VR) score band at intake -
a factor.  Levels are bottom 25%, mid 50%, and
top 25%.
parameters.sex: Sex of the student - levels are F and M.
parameters.schgend:
School gender - a factor.  Levels are mixed,
boys, and girls.
parameters.intake:
Band of student's intake score - a factor.
Levels are bottom 25%, mid 50% and top
	25%./
parameters.type: School type - levels are Mxd and Sngl.

format: A data frame with 4059 observations on the following 9 variables.
